Washington, DC Georgian Homes For Sale

Please see all Washington, DC Georgian homes for sale below.

Georgian-style Homes in Washington, DC: Timeless Charm and Architectural Splendor

Georgian-style homes, with their timeless charm, exquisite proportions, and architectural splendor, grace the streets of Washington, DC. These homes, inspired by the classical Georgian architecture of the 18th century, evoke a sense of elegance and grandeur that continues to captivate homeowners.

The Allure of Georgian Architecture

Georgian-style homes draw inspiration from the architectural traditions of the Georgian era, known for its balance, symmetry, and restrained ornamentation. These homes showcase the following characteristics:

Symmetrical Facades: Georgian-style homes exhibit a symmetrical design, with a centered front door and evenly spaced windows on each side. The harmonious arrangement creates a sense of balance and proportion.

Neoclassical Elements: Influenced by classical architecture, Georgian-style homes often feature neoclassical elements such as columns, pediments, and pilasters. These decorative elements enhance the façade and add a touch of sophistication.

Multi-Pane Windows: Georgian homes typically have multi-pane windows, commonly with six-over-six or nine-over-nine configurations. These windows, often framed with shutters, contribute to the elegance and character of the home.

Hipped or Gable Roofs: Georgian-style homes may have hipped roofs with four sloping sides or gable roofs with two sloping sides. The roofs are typically symmetrical and complement the overall balanced design of the home.

Central Entryways: Georgian homes often feature a prominent central entryway, sometimes adorned with a decorative door surround or portico. This focal point adds a sense of grandeur and welcomes guests in style.

Georgian Homes in Washington, DC Neighborhoods

Washington, DC boasts several neighborhoods known for their collection of Georgian-style homes. Here are some neighborhoods where you can explore the architectural splendor of Georgian homes:

Georgetown: As one of the oldest neighborhoods in DC, Georgetown showcases a mix of architectural styles, including beautiful Georgian homes. Wander through its historic streets to discover residences that exude timeless elegance.

Massachusetts Avenue Heights: Situated along Massachusetts Avenue, this neighborhood features luxurious homes, some of which embrace Georgian architectural influences. Explore the area to find homes that capture the grace and grandeur of this style.

Spring Valley: Nestled in Northwest DC, Spring Valley offers a serene setting with picturesque streets lined with Georgian-style homes. Experience the tranquility and architectural beauty of this residential enclave.

Wesley Heights: With its tree-lined streets and upscale homes, Wesley Heights showcases Georgian-style residences that radiate elegance and sophistication. Explore the neighborhood to find homes with timeless appeal.

Cleveland Park: Known for its diverse collection of architectural styles, Cleveland Park is home to Georgian-inspired homes. Take a stroll through the neighborhood to appreciate the classic charm and architectural details of these residences.

Kalorama: Nestled in Northwest DC, Kalorama is renowned for its stately homes and embassies. Among the impressive residences in this neighborhood, you can find Georgian-style homes that capture the grace and grandeur of this architectural style.

Forest Hills: Located in Northwest DC, Forest Hills is characterized by its tree-lined streets and lush greenery. Here, you can find Georgian-inspired homes that harmonize with the neighborhood's serene ambiance.

Woodley Park: Situated in Northwest DC and adjacent to Rock Creek Park, Woodley Park offers a tranquil setting and proximity to nature. Explore the area to discover Georgian-style homes that blend elegance with the neighborhood's peaceful atmosphere.

Berkley (Foxhall Crescent): Tucked away in Northwest DC, Berkley is known for its upscale residences and secluded feel. This neighborhood features Georgian-inspired homes that epitomize sophistication and timeless beauty.

Kent: Located in Northwest DC, Kent offers a suburban-like setting with spacious lots and beautiful homes. Georgian-style residences can be found here, adding to the neighborhood's charm and elegance.

Observatory Circle: Situated near the National Cathedral, Observatory Circle is home to historic homes and elegant estates. Among them, you can find Georgian-style residences that exude architectural splendor and classic refinement.

Georgian-Style Homes for Sale in Washington, DC

If you're captivated by the timeless charm of Georgian-style homes and are searching for your dream property in Washington, DC, you'll find a selection of exquisite Georgian homes available for sale. These homes offer a unique blend of architectural character, historical significance, and modern comforts.

Explore Georgian Homes in Washington, DC

Georgian-style homes in Washington, DC embody the timeless elegance and architectural splendor of this beloved style. From their symmetrical designs and neoclassical elements to their refined details and exquisite proportions, these homes exude a sense of grandeur and sophistication.

When exploring listings and visiting open houses, it's important to consider your preferences and needs. Factors such as size, layout, location, and proximity to amenities should be taken into account.
